MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY16 postcode area of St Andrews. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:30am due to an underground cable fault and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:45am on Thursday, 29 April 2021
